channel.title: Health on Honza Pokorny
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Honza Pokorny

item.title: Programmers and sore eyes
item.description: Under normal circumstances, the human eye should blink about once every 5 seconds. When you stare at an LCD screen all day long, the blink interval gets larger. As a result, your eyes become dry and sore. This is further worsened by coffee. Drinking lots of water and using over-the-counter drops will help. This is what my eye doctor told me yesterday.
